channel.title: The Glazy Wiki Died :( - Glazy Ceramics Wiki
channel.description: Topics in the 'The Glazy Wiki Died :(' category This Discourse Wiki was an attempt to provide a home for Glazy’s documentation as well as support and discussion related to glaze chemistry. Unfortunately it didn’t work out.

item.title: About the The Glazy Wiki Died :(
item.dc:creator: ceramicswiki
item.description:
This Discourse Wiki was an attempt to provide a home for Glazy’s documentation as well as support and discussion related to glaze chemistry. Unfortunately it didn’t work out.

You can now have discussions directly in Glazy, just go to https://glazy.org/ and create a new Post.

2 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic
item.source: About the The Glazy Wiki Died :(
